member.name: T:Nodus.Client.Abstractions.IBleClientService
member.summary: Abstraction for BLE client operations with explicit error handling and cancellation support.

member.name: P:Nodus.Client.Abstractions.IBleClientService.ConnectionState
member.summary: Current connection state observable.

member.name: P:Nodus.Client.Abstractions.IBleClientService.IsConnected
member.summary: Indicates if currently connected to a server or relay.

member.name: P:Nodus.Client.Abstractions.IBleClientService.LastRssi
member.summary: Last measured RSSI value.

member.name: E:Nodus.Client.Abstractions.IBleClientService.ServerDiscovered
member.summary: Event raised when a server/relay is discovered during scanning.

member.name: E:Nodus.Client.Abstractions.IBleClientService.ConnectionStatusChanged
member.summary: Event raised when connection status changes.

member.name: E:Nodus.Client.Abstractions.IBleClientService.LinkCountChanged
member.summary: Event raised when nearby link count changes (for Trickle algorithm).

member.name: M:Nodus.Client.Abstractions.IBleClientService.StartScanningForServerAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Starts scanning for Nodus servers and relays.

member.name: M:Nodus.Client.Abstractions.IBleClientService.StopScanning
member.summary: Stops scanning for servers.

member.name: M:Nodus.Client.Abstractions.IBleClientService.ConnectAsync(Shiny.BluetoothLE.IPeripheral,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Connects to a discovered peripheral with timeout.

member.name: M:Nodus.Client.Abstractions.IBleClientService.SendVoteAsync(Nodus.Shared.Models.Vote,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sends a vote packet with encryption and signing.

member.name: M:Nodus.Client.Abstractions.IBleClientService.RelayPacketAsync(Nodus.Shared.Protocol.NodusPacket,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Relays a packet without modification (for relay nodes).

member.name: M:Nodus.Client.Abstractions.IBleClientService.DisconnectAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Disconnects from the current peripheral.

member.name: T:Nodus.Client.Services.BleClientService
member.summary: Professional BLE Client Service with CancellationToken support, timeout handling, connection state machine, and retry logic with exponential backoff. Implements IBleClientService for testability.

member.name: M:Nodus.Client.Services.BleClientService.SendPacketAsync(Nodus.Shared.Protocol.NodusPacket,System.Object,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Sends a secure packet. Encrypts payload and signs the packet.

member.name: M:Nodus.Client.Services.BleClientService.RelayPacketAsync(Nodus.Shared.Protocol.NodusPacket,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Relays a packet exactly as received (Forwarding). Does NOT re-encrypt or re-sign.

member.name: M:Nodus.Client.Services.BleClientService.RetryWithBackoffAsync(System.Func{System.Threading.Tasks.Task{Nodus.Shared.Common.Result}},System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Retry logic with exponential backoff for transient BLE failures.
